name: hiten style
description:
This is an embedding model (textual inversion) mimicking the famous painter hiten's style.

To use this embedding, simply put the word tag hiten1 at the end of the positive prompts.

(some of the sample images are photoshopped)

I mainly use the model betterMix_Anime to cooperate with this embedding, the link to betterMix_Anime is below:

https://civitai.com/models/15426/bettermixanime

Link to hiten's pixiv profile webpage:

https://www.pixiv.net/users/490219

I've also uploaded this model to hugging face, link is below

https://huggingface.co/SakanakoChan/BetterMix2.0_Anime
